result.title: How to solve SUMQ on CodeChef ?
result.content:
Hello guys,

SUMQ was a question asked in June Long Challenge. I got TLE for two case out of 4 in subtask 2 and got AC in subtask 1. Please help to improve this code I don't know now what to do further in this code to optimise it more. 

t=int(input())
def binary(a,k):
    low=0
    ans=-1
    high=len(a)-1
    while low<=high:
        mid=(low+high)//2
        if a[mid]<=k:
            ans=mid
            low=mid+1
        else:
            high=mid-1
    return ans
while t>0:
    p,q,r=map(int,input().split())
    a=list(map(int,input().split()))
    b=list(map(int,input().split()))
    c=list(map(int,input().split()))
    a=sorted(a)
    c=sorted(c)
    suma=[]
    sumc=[]
    suma.append(0)
    sumc.append(0)
    i=0
    s=0
    while i<len(a):
        s+=a[i]
        suma.append(s)
        i+=1
    i=0
    s=0
    while i<len(c):
        s+=c[i]
        sumc.append(s)
        i+=1
    i=0
    ans=0
    while i<len(b):
        posa=binary(a,b[i])+1
        vara=suma[posa]
        posc=binary(c,b[i])+1
        varc=sumc[posc]
        ansa=posa
        ansc=posc
        ans+=((ansa)*(ansc)*(b[i]**2)+(varc*ansa+vara*ansc)*b[i]+vara*varc)%(10**9+7)
        i+=1
    print(ans%(10**9+7))
    t-=1
